Class MyShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • MyShape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MyBoundedShape, MyLine

    public abstract class MyShape
extends java.lang.Object
    this is an abstract class of shapes and has the coordinates of the point and the color.
